text: @SenWarren @TheJohnDiMaggio For forks sake. Reducing testing is going to reduce cases, but it's not going to reduce the death toll. People will catch & die from COVID-19 & no one will know if they have it, because the Great Pumpkin has reduced testing. Such an awful move.
